sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-text-field
      v-model="note.title"
      label="Title"
      outlined
      filled
      clearable
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-textarea v-model="note.body" filled outlined auto-grow></v-textarea>
    <v-btn
      v-on:click="updateNote($route.params.id)"
      color="teal lighten-1"
      dark
    >
      Update
    </v-btn>
    <v-btn v-on:click="deleteNote($route.params.id)" color="error"
      >Delete</v-btn
    >
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "NotesList",

  data: function () {
    return {
      selectedItem: 1,
      note: null,
      message: null,
    };
  },

  methods: {
    getNote: function (id) {
      axios
        .get(`http://localhost:3000/notes/${id}`)
        .then((response) => (this.note = response.data));
    },
    deleteNote: function (id) {
      axios
        .delete(`http://localhost:3000/notes/${id}`)
        .then((response) => (this.message = response.data));
        this.note.title = ""
        this.note.body = ""
    },
    updateNote: function (id) {
      axios
        .patch(`http://localhost:3000/notes/${id}`, {
          title: this.note.title,
          body: this.note.body,
        })
        .then((response) => (this.note = response.data));
    },
  },

  mounted: function () {
    //this.getNote(this.$route.params.id);
  },
};
</script>
